Title: Eddie the Eagle
Genre: Biography, Comedy, Drama, Family, History, Sport
Writer: Simon Kelton (story), Sean Macaulay (screenplay), Simon Kelton (screenplay)
Actors: Tom Costello, Jo Hartley, Keith Allen, Dickon Tolson
Plot: The story of Eddie Edwards, the notoriously tenacious British underdog ski jumper who charmed the world at the 1988 Winter Olympics.
Production: Matthew Vaughn, Saville Productions, Studio Babelsberg
